resources.string: We would greatly appreciate it if you could Rate Us on the play store
Hi there, I´m Rodrigo the developer of this app. i just finished developing a new game would you like to try it ? It´s free !
Put a bill on the screen and you will se the watermarks and in the case of the uv light some colored marks. Make shure to be in a dark place if using the uv light
Conterfeit Money Detecotr was designed by Rodrigo Gonzalez Fantino. Did you like this app?
Put the note near the light and verify in the clearer area an animal and the note value

50 and 100 reais notes have an holographic sash which has the following effects: A) NOte value number and the "REAIS" word B) The animal changes his colour. C) The leaf (in the 50's notes) and the coral (in 100' notes) reveals differens colours when you move it.
